channel.title: Client Crashes
channel.description:
Ok, So i can log on to my server just fine, And so can everyone else, But my Client crashes and theres does not. Any tips on how i can stop my client from crashing? (It only crashes if im in game, If im sitting at the login screen it doesnt crash it crashes about 30 seconds after log in)
*It happens with every client after 2 clicks.

item.title: Client Crashes
item.dc:creator: @snoopydawg2 snoopydawg2
item.description:
@snoopydawg2 wrote:

melt man1:

Are you on windows 7?

Yes, But my friend also crashes and he is on Vista.

Can anyone help? : /

Read full topic
